item.title: Resume
item.description: My Resume on the Web # While I am not actively searching for employment at the moment I’m always interested to hear about interesting projects. Please see my resume and of course please feel free to email me with any questions. Contact Information: # Gregory Silverstein Bethlehem PA 18018 greg.silverstein@gmail.com Objectives: # I look to work on interesting software projects. Who doesn’t! Specifically I enjoy projects that need help clarifying requirments and design as well as opportunities to teach less technical team memebers how to get what they really want out of a computer.
